data.name: Dialogs_DisconnectError_msg_KillSwitch
data.value: Kill switch is protecting your IP by blocking all connections. In case of trouble you can disable kill switch.
data.comment: The text displayed in Disconnect modal window if the disconnect occurred with kill switch turned on.

data.name: Dialogs_DisconnectError_btn_DisableKillSwitch
data.comment: The text on Disable button in Disconnect modal window

data.name: Dialogs_DisconnectError_msg_AllAdaptersInUse
data.value: Your network adapter is currently in use.
data.comment: The error description displayed in Disconnect modal window if all TAP adapters are in use

data.name: Dialogs_DisconnectError_msg_TapErrorHelp
data.value: Please see this support <Hyperlink Command="{Binding OpenHelpArticleCommand}">article</Hyperlink> how to fix it.
data.comment: The text displayed in Disconnect modal window if TAP error is detected

data.name: Dialogs_DisconnectError_msg_NoTap
data.comment: The error description displayed in Disconnect modal window if TAP adapter is not installed

data.name: Dialogs_DisconnectError_msg_OldVersion
data.value: The network adapter version is outdated.
data.comment: The error description displayed in Disconnect modal window if TAP adapter version is too low

data.name: Dialogs_DisconnectError_msg_NoServers
data.value: There are no servers available right now for your selection. Please select a different option.
data.comment: The error description displayed in Disconnect modal window if disconnected because there are no servers available to connect to

data.name: Connecting_lbl_FailedConnection_1
data.comment: The beginning of text for VPN server failed to connect to in Connecting overlay of main app window. It shall be translated as a text before imaginary placeholder {0} in the text string "Connection to {0} has failed". If translated text suppose to not include any text before the placeholder {0} then please leave it empty. Do not include placeholder {0} into translated text.

data.name: Connecting_lbl_FailedConnection_2
data.comment: The end of text for VPN server failed to connect to in Connecting overlay of main app window. It shall be translated as a text after imaginary placeholder {0} in the text string "Connection to {0} has failed". If translated text suppose to not include any text after the placeholder {0} then please leave it empty. Do not include placeholder {0} into translated text.

data.name: Settings_Connection_DefaultProtocol_val_Smart

data.name: Sidebar_Connection_lbl_KillSwitch
data.comment: The text displayed in the sidebar when connection dropped and kill switch is turned on

data.name: Sidebar_Connection_lbl_KillSwitch_Info
data.value: Kill switch is blocking all connections to avoid leaking your data.
data.comment: Tooltip message shown in sidebar connection status box when hovered on exclamation mark icon

data.name: App_msg_UpdateConnectedConfirm
data.value: To complete the update process, Proton VPN will temporarily disconnect and deactivate Permanent kill switch if any of these are active. Do you want to continue?
